languages.text: "Духовною пищей? Ее никогда не бывает вдоволь. Тем детям, что обучены грамоте, не помешали бы новые молитвенники и жития святых. Самим изучить и почитать своим товарищам".
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."
languages.original_text: "Духовною пищей? Ее никогда не бывает вдоволь. Тем детям, что обучены грамоте, не помешали бы новые молитвенники и жития святых. Самим изучить и почитать своим товарищам".

traits.locale_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and reading to their fellows."
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and reading to their fellows."
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."
"Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

languages.text: « Si vous parlez d'enrichissement spirituel, nous en manquons toujours. Les enfants qui savent lire auraient bien besoin de nouveaux livres de prières et d'hagiographies, aussi bien pour leur propre éducation que pour en faire la lecture aux autres. »
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous parlez d'enrichissement spirituel, nous en manquons toujours. Les enfants qui savent lire auraient bien besoin de nouveaux livres de prières et d'hagiographies, aussi bien pour leur propre éducation que pour en faire la lecture aux autres. »

languages.text: «¿Se refiere a sus necesidades espirituales? Toda ayuda es poca. A los niños que saben leer les vendría muy bien disponer de nuevos devocionarios y santorales, como lecturas personales y para recitarlos a los demás».
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se refiere a sus necesidades espirituales? Toda ayuda es poca. A los niños que saben leer les vendría muy bien disponer de nuevos devocionarios y santorales, como lecturas personales y para recitarlos a los demás».

languages.text: “您指的是精神方面的滋养吗？这方面始终都是供不应求。那些识字的孩子需要新的祈祷书和圣徒传记，供他们自行阅读，或是读给其他人听。”
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

traits.locale_text: “您指的是精神方面的滋养吗？这方面始终都是供不应求。那些识字的孩子需要新的祈祷书和圣徒传记，供他们自行阅读，或是读给其他人听。”

languages.text: 「精神的な栄養のことですか？それは常に不足しています。識字能力のある子供たちは、新しい祈祷書や聖書があれば、自分で読んだり、仲間に読み聞かせたりすることができるでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

traits.locale_text: 「精神的な栄養のことですか？それは常に不足しています。識字能力のある子供たちは、新しい祈祷書や聖書があれば、自分で読んだり、仲間に読み聞かせたりすることができでしょうね」

languages.text: "Meint Ihr spirituelle Stärkung? Die ist immer rar. Die Kinder, die lesen können, könnten neue Gebetsbücher und Hagiographien brauchen, zur eigenen Lektüre und um anderen daraus vorzulesen."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."

traits.locale_text: "Meint Ihr spirituelle Stärkung? Die ist immer rar. Die Kinder, die lesen können, könnten neue Gebetsbücher und Hagiographien brauchen, zur eigenen Lektüre und um anderen daraus vorzulesen."

languages.text: "Ruhlarının beslenmesinden mi bahsediyorsunuz? Bu tip besinler her zaman için yetersizdir. Okuma yazma bilen çocuklar için yeni dua kitapları ve mukaddes yazıtlar gerekir. Bunları hem kendileri okur hem de başkalarına okurlar."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean spiritual nourishment? It is ever in short supply. Those children who are literate could use new prayer books and hagiographies, for their own perusal and to read to the others."
